targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__time(datum), lat, lng, 0 as type, null as address, ap FROM pos WHERE $__timeFilter(datum) and carid = $Car UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 1 as type, concat('',address, '
Date: ',pos.datum, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) ,'min
Charged: ',charging.charge_energy_added, 'kWh
Max Power:', max_charger_power, 'kW') as address, 0 as ap FROM chargingstate join charging on endchargingid = charging.id join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id WHERE $__timeFilter(pos.datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and (fast_charger_brand = 'Tesla' or address like '%Supercharger%') UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 2 as type, concat('',address, '
Date: ',pos.datum, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) ,'min
Charged: ',charging.charge_energy_added, 'kWh
Max Power:', max_charger_power, 'kW') as address, 0 as ap FROM chargingstate join charging on endchargingid = charging.id join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id WHERE $__timeFilter(pos.datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and ((fast_charger_brand is not null && fast_charger_brand not in ('Tesla') and fast_charger_present = 1 and address not like '%supercharger%') or (fast_charger_present is null and max_charger_power > 25 and address not like '%supercharger%')) UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(pos.datum) as time_sec, lat, lng, 3 as type, concat('',address, '
Date: ',pos.datum, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) ,'min
Charged: ',charging.charge_energy_added, 'kWh
Max Power:', max_charger_power, 'kW') as address, 0 as ap FROM chargingstate join charging on endchargingid = charging.id join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id WHERE $__timeFilter(pos.datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and ((fast_charger_present = 0) or (fast_charger_present is null and max_charger_power < 25 and address not like '%supercharger%')) UNION SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T1.time_sec) as time_sec, lat, lng, 4 as type, concat('', address,'
Date: ',T1.time_sec, '
Duration: ', TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,T1.time_sec, T2.time_sec), 'min'), 0 as ap FROM ( SELECT @rowid:=@rowid+1 as rowid, drivestate.EndDate as time_sec, lat, lng, 4 as type, address FROM drivestate join pos on drivestate.EndPos = pos.id, (SELECT @rowid:=0) as init WHERE $__timeFilter(drivestate.EndDate) and drivestate.CarID = $Car ) T1 join ( SELECT @rowid2:=@rowid2+1 as rowid, drivestate.StartDate as time_sec FROM drivestate join pos on drivestate.EndPos = pos.id, (SELECT @rowid2:=0) as init WHERE $__timeFilter(drivestate.EndDate) and drivestate.CarID = $Car ) T2 on T1.rowid+1=T2.rowid ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT       
  sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added) as kWh,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then chargingstate.charge_energy_added else null END) as kWhDC,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then NULL else chargingstate.charge_energy_added END) as kWhAC,

  sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added) / (SELECT max(odometer) - min(odometer) FROM pos WHERE  $__timeFilter(datum) and carid = $Car) * 100 as Consumption100km,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) else null END) as MinutesDC,
  min(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) else null END) as MinMinutesDC,
  avg(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) else null END) as AVGMinutesDC,
  max(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) else null END) as MaxMinutesDC,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then 1 else 0 END) as CountDC,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then null else TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) END) as MinutesAC,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then 0 else 1 END) as CountAC,
  sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate)) as MinuteDiff         
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 2
and chargingstate.CarId = $Car 
order by StartDate desc

SELECT       
  sum(cost_total) as Total,
  sum(cost_total) / (SELECT max(odometer) - min(odometer) FROM pos WHERE  $__timeFilter(datum) and carid = $Car) * 100 as Cost100km,
  sum(cost_total) / sum(chargingstate.charge_energy_added) as avgCostkWh,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then cost_total else 0 end) / 
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then chargingstate.charge_energy_added  else 0 end) as avgCostkWhDC,
  min(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then cost_total / chargingstate.charge_energy_added else null end) minCostkWhDC,
  max(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then cost_total / chargingstate.charge_energy_added else null end) maxCostkWhDC,
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then 0 else cost_total end) / 
  sum(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then 0 else chargingstate.charge_energy_added end) as avgCostkWhAC,
  min(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then null else cost_total / chargingstate.charge_energy_added end) minCostkWhAC,
  max(case WHEN fast_charger_present = 1 or max_charger_power > 23 then null else cost_total / chargingstate.charge_energy_added end) maxCostkWhAC
  
FROM            charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID 
                         LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 2
and chargingstate.CarId = $Car 
order by StartDate desc

SELECT 
  round((SELECT max(odometer) - min(odometer) FROM pos WHERE  $__timeFilter(datum) and carid = $Car),1) as kmDriven,
  max(speed_max) as speed_max, max(power_max) as power_max, (select sum(km_diff) / sum(DurationMinutes) * 60) as avg_kmh
from trip WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StartDate) and km_diff < 1000 and CarID = $Car 
order by StartDate desc

SELECT 
    max(EndOdometer - StartOdometer) AS maxKmDrivenPerCharge,
    max((EndOdometer - StartOdometer) / (StartSOC - EndSOC) * 100) AS MaxCalculatedRangePerCharge,
    (SELECT max(km_diff) from trip WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and km_diff < 1000 and CarID = $Car ) as maxTripKm,
    (SELECT min(km_diff) from trip WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and km_diff < 1000 and CarID = $Car and km_diff > 10) as minTripKm,
    (SELECT avg(km_diff) from trip WHERE $__timeFilter(StartDate) and km_diff < 1000 and CarID = $Car and km_diff > 10) as avgTripKm
FROM
    (SELECT 
        (@rowid1:=@rowid1 + 1) firstSeq,
            # chargingstate.ID AS EndId,
            chargingstate.EndDate AS StartTrip,
            charging.battery_level AS StartSOC,
            charging.ideal_battery_range_km AS StartRange,
            pos.odometer AS StartOdometer     ,
            wh_tr
    FROM
        charging
    INNER JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.EndChargingID
    INNER JOIN cars on chargingstate.carid = cars.id
    INNER JOIN pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id
    JOIN (SELECT @rowid1:=0) a
    WHERE $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car  and
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3  and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4
    ORDER BY StartDate DESC) AS TEnd
        JOIN
    (SELECT 
        (@rowid2:=@rowid2 + 1) secondSeq,
          #  chargingstate.ID AS StartId,
            chargingstate.StartDate AS EndTrip,
            charging.battery_level AS EndSOC,
            charging.ideal_battery_range_km AS EndRange,
            pos.odometer AS EndOdometer
    FROM
        charging
    INNER JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID
    INNER JOIN pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id
    JOIN (SELECT @rowid2:=0) a
    WHERE $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car  and
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3  and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4
    ORDER BY StartDate DESC) AS TStart ON TEnd.firstSeq = TStart.secondSeq + 1
    where (EndOdometer - StartOdometer between 5 and 1000) and ((EndOdometer - StartOdometer) / (StartSOC - EndSOC)) < 10 and StartSOC > EndSOC and EndOdometer - StartOdometer > 20
order by StartTrip desc

select 
sum(CO2_Mix)/1000 as "CO2 kg mix", sum(CO2_Mix) / (max(odometer) - min(odometer)) as "CO2 g/km mix",
sum(CO2_Mix) / (max(odometer) - min(odometer)) / 10 / 2.37 as "L gasoline / 100km",
sum(CO2_Mix) / (max(odometer) - min(odometer)) / 10 / 2.65 as "L diesel / 100km",
(select sum(case when co2_g_kWh > 0 then null else charge_energy_added end) from chargingstate where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.CarId = $Car) as missingCO2kWh
from
(
SELECT co2_g_kWh,  
	CASE WHEN meter_vehicle_kwh_sum > meter_utility_kwh_sum THEN (select 1-(meter_utility_kwh_sum / meter_vehicle_kwh_sum)) else 0 END as PV_percent,
	charge_energy_added, 
    charge_energy_added * (1-(select PV_percent)) as Grid, 
    charge_energy_added * (select PV_percent) as PV,
	(select Grid) * co2_g_kWh as CO2_Grid,
    charge_energy_added * co2_g_kWh as CO2_Mix,
    odometer
	FROM chargingstate join pos on chargingstate.pos = pos.id
	where $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) > 3 and chargingstate.EndChargingID - chargingstate.StartChargingID > 4
and chargingstate.CarId = $Car and odometer > 0
	) T

SELECT   $__time(datum),  altitude as 'Höhe [m]'
FROM  pos
WHERE  $__timeFilter(datum) and CarID = $Car
ORDER BY  Datum ASC

SELECT speed div 10 * 10 as kmh, count(*) / (select count(*) from pos where $__timeFilter(datum) and CarID = $Car) as total
FROM pos 
where $__timeFilter(datum) and CarID = $Car
group by speed div 10 
having kmh >= 10

SELECT chargingstate.id * 100 as color, address, charger_power, charging.battery_level
FROM teslalogger.charging 
join chargingstate on charging.id between StartChargingID and EndChargingID 
join pos on chargingstate.Pos = pos.id
WHERE charging.CarID=$Car and $__timeFilter(charging.Datum) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and $__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate)
order by chargingstate.id, charging.id

list.definition: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
list.label: Fahrzeug
list.name: Car
list.query: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
